result.name: pendle-trade-union-facility-time
result.notes:
This details the staff resources (in the form of union representatives) and spend related to Trade Union duties at Pendle Council.

The 31/03/2014 dataset does not contain a spend estimate as this is not currently recorded; however, measures are being put into place to record this information from 01/04/2015 onwards.
result.title: Pendle Trade Union Facility TIme
